channel.title: Homes on Kaspar Rufibach
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Kaspar Rufibach

item.description: About I am a mathematical statistician. Through more than 15 years in various biostatistical roles I have complemented my thorough theoretical background with expertise in biostatistics. I am passionate about applying this expertise to solve problems in pharmaceutical drug development. CV (PDF) Publications (PDF) Talks (PDF) Teaching (PDF)

item.title: Statistical publications
item.description: A list of my biomedical publications is available as PDF: List of publications

item.title: Software
item.description: A considerable amount of software grew out of my research. Most of this code is made available as packages for the freely available software R and can be downloaded from CRAN.

item.title: Teaching and thesis supervision
item.description: I am regularly teaching to statisticians and non-statisticians about various biostatistical topics. Slides are available for download for some of the courses.

item.title: Working groups
item.description: I am a member of several cross-industry working groups. Further information on these is provided below.
